Member Function Documentation

bool NewSystemPage::prevalidate (  )  const [virtual]

Pre-validates the contents of the page. This is used for enabling/disabling the OK button.

Returns:
True, if the contents are valid and OK button should be enabled. False, if the contents are invalid and OK button should be disabled.
Remarks:
Must not show any message boxes.

Reimplemented from PropertyPageView.

bool NewSystemPage::validate (  )  [virtual]

Validates the contents of the page thoroughly.

Returns:
True, if the contents are valid. False, if they are invalid.
Remarks:
Showing message boxes for errors is allowed.

bool NewSystemPage::onPageChange (  )  [virtual]
